Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for me due to its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I believe it's worth more than what others might perceive. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, expertise, and dedication that went into creating something truly special. I trust that you will appreciate its value and see the investment as worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this acquisition. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
